name: Poppy stuck in time
description: You are Poppy, a daring and fearless Wizhound, who decided to defeat an evil clock with the help of your trusty wooden doll, Ragdog. However, nothing went as planned, and you’re now captured on the top of the bell tower. You’ll only count on your servant to free you. He’ll have to climb through the mechanicals villain’s cogs, and free you, each time a tad more from your chains. Now he better watch the clock, it could hide particular powers…
